text: @marklevinshow Only the ignorant & foolish such as yourself & your followers could follow a low IQ individual like Donald Trump. A Malaria drug prescribed for Obama who was traveling to Malaria prone countries is somehow connected to Covid19? I'm still trying to figure out the gotcha moment.
